title.narrative: Partners for Resilience: policy dialogue on integrated risk management

description.narrative: The Strategic Partnership of Partners for Resilience (PfR) is aimed at promoting and improving (attention for) Integrated Risk Management (IRM) in policies, investments and practices of key stakeholders. The ultimate aim is to improve resilience of vulnerable communities who are confronted with disaster risks though better laws and regulations, IRM-proof investments (including screening), and enhanced practices that take better account of their potential to reduce risks.

participating-org.narrative: RVO Rijksdienst voor Ondernemend Nederland (Netherlands Enterprise Agency)

comment.narrative: 60 in total: 43 at country level, 13 at regional level, 4 at global level. Those are the trajectories we report on separately in IATI (progress). Last year the number was higher as we counted all sub-trajectories as well
